description: NG Alarm network trap
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MWRM-NETWORK-MIB::alarmTrap MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmCounter i 9999 MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmRaisedTimeT i 9999 MWRM-NETWORK-MIB::genEquipNetworkAgentIp a 192.0.2.1 MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmId i 9999 MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmDesc s EXAMPLE MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmIfIndex i 9999 MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmInstance i 9999 MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmSeverity i 0 MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmState i 0 MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmUserText s EXAMPLE MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipTrapCfgMgrCLLI s EXAMPLE MWRM-NETWORK-MIB::genEquipNetworkAgentIpV6 s EXAMPLE

description: A running counter of open alarms, incremented upon each new alarm.
variables.name: MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmCounter

description: The rasied time of this alarm.
Time in seconds since January 1, 1970 00:00 UTC.
variables.name: MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmRaisedTimeT

description: This value indicates the Agent IP address. (same as genEquipNetworkManagmentLocalIp)
variables.name: MWRM-NETWORK-MIB::genEquipNetworkAgentIp

description: Alarm ID. List of alarm IDs is available in the MIB Ref. Guide.
variables.name: MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmId

description: The alarm description (same as the description in the sent trap).
variables.name: MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmDesc

description: Interface Index where the alarm occurred, alarms that are
not associated with specific interfaces will have the following value:
For a non-interface alarm, the value is: 65001
variables.name: MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmIfIndex

description: In the case of alarms that may have several appereances (at interfaces, channels, VCs, etc.), this parameter indicates the instance of the alarm.
variables.name: MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmInstance

description: The current Alarm severity
the values can be:
- indeterminate(0)
- critical(1)
- major(2)
- minor(3)
- warning(4)
- cleared(5)
variables.name: MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmSeverity

description: The state of the alarm (cleared or rasied).
variables.name: MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmState

description: An additional description of the event or fault, or any other information that user wants to attach to it.
variables.name: MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipCurrentAlarmUserText

description: Common Language Location Identifier (maximum length: 100 chars)
variables.name: MWRM-UNIT-MIB::genEquipTrapCfgMgrCLLI

description: This value indicates the agent IP V6. This parameter will be use for Trap only.
variables.name: MWRM-NETWORK-MIB::genEquipNetworkAgentIpV6

description: Event network trap

description: STP trap.
(1) The description field shows show the descriptions of the event
STP event - on port: <port>, root id: <root id>, Bridge role: <bridge role>
Role: <Role>, State: <state>
In addition to the general trap event var-binds, this trap also adds the STP parameters.
